The State of Marketing Automation

From the Agency Marketer's Perspective

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Marketing automation is no longer the new kid on the block when it comes to the typical martech stack.

In fact, we partnered with Ascend2 to survey 95 marketing agency professionals about how they’re using marketing automation for themselves and their clients, and found out most are feeling confident in their abilities. #humblebrag

Check out all the data in this eBook. You’ll learn what’s working for agencies, and see how your agency’s strategy around marketing automation compares.[/vc_column_text]

A little about SharpSpring:
[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron hidden”]If you’re not familiar with SharpSpring, we’re a revenue growth platform with a powerful suite of sales & marketing automation tools to help you boost conversions and deliver results.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/360856486″ align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625237552774{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]
